desc: We intend for a Uber-Esq IOS Application:This will be the MVP will be for an Uber Esq Application for the tutoring industry. So here is the service our product should provide:1)	On app opening, user will get option to sign in or sign up via email or social media and complete a profile along with a valid Debit or Credit card.2)	Once signed up, they choose if they’re a Teacher or a Learner.3)	Process of hiring: User selects level of study (SATs, GCSE, A-level etc), User selects categories of subject area (Math, English, Science etc), depending on level of study the User will be required to choose a subcategory such as topic. Platform will then use Machine Learning to allocate a Teacher who meet’s the User’s criteria. If User is happy with the allocated Teacher, they will request a session with the time slots available (if not, user can select "reshuffle" option of "Let me choose"). Tutor will then confirm, Chat will be open for User’s and Teachers to communicate beforehand and discuss requirements. Once the session is complete, tutor will confirm and payment will be charged from User’s registered card. User then leaves feedback for the session (Star rating). If the User wishes to rehire same tutor, they just select rehire and book slot.4)	Process of working: User completes onboarding process including DBS and Reference Checks. Tutor will set an Availability block on profile, and or if they have free time they can places themselves as Available therefore they can be hired on Demand. Once Tutor has been allocated to User, and User request session. Tutor confirms and can chat to the user to clarify requirements. After the session Tutor confirms on the app the session is complete and card is charged. After the session, tutor will leave note’s/homework on User’s profile.Tutors dashboard will include all the relative information such as earnings of the week, projected earnings, bookings, past bookings, my personal statement, What i teach.From each hire 15% is deducted as our fee on the application.This is an overview of what we wish to create.
title: Build IOS Marketplace Application for the Tutoring World.

Payroll input; 20 lines and 13 columns.  4 input columns; vlookup and other basic calculations.2. Claim input;  34 lines and 14 columns.  5 input columns, vlookup and other basic calculations3. Table of Rates; 600 lines; 8 columns for vlookup; updated each year.4. Table of Factors; a few lines and columns for vlookup.  updated each year.5. Summary; 21 formulas; [add, subtract, divide, multiply, round]How difficult to save each client's data to revise claim amounts? desc: Hello everybody,I want a simple web system for archiving & viewing certain tasks/projects.##### The idea -in steps-:1- the (admin) creates a new project.2- the (editor) create project's variable & details, included major steps required to complete the project. And then give access to selected users (employees) for accessing the project itself. Plus invite the project's client (invited guest user) to monitor the current project only. Finally, the (editor) upload the project document in pdf format.3- the (normal users: employees) login, start envolve in the project. they:*) upload 2 types of letters in PDF format (incoming letter) & (outgoing letter) each upload will be considered as a small step in the current major step. each upload will be with comments from the uploader (employee).*) upload a blueprint (different document from the 2 types above) with comments too, & it is still in the major step.*) check the box of completing the current major step, & writing comments on the major step itself.4- the client (invited guest user) login, then monitor the progress of completing the major steps only and their comments [can NOT see the small steps or the small steps files & comments. ONLY major steps progress & major steps comment].5- (admin) & (editor), they also could see what the (invited guest user) can see +plus+ all small steps and their comments & files. for the current project & all other projects.##### The user's types & users role:1- (admin): create, edit, delete & archive -after completing- [Projects] + create, edit & delete (editor) users + create, edit & delete (employee) + create, edit & delete (invited guest user) + monitor [Projects] AND its Major & small steps + upload [Incoming Letter] & [Outgoing Letter] & [Blueprint] + check a check box for a major step + comment on major step.2- (editor): edit & archive -after completing- [Projects] + create, edit & delete (employee) + create, edit & delete (invited guest user) + monitor [Projects] AND its Major & small steps + upload [Incoming Letter] & [Outgoing Letter] & [Blueprint] + check a check box for a major step + comment on major step.3- (employee): monitor assigned [Projects] AND its Major & small steps + upload [Incoming Letter] & [Outgoing Letter] & [Blueprint] + check a check box for a major step + comment on major step. can NOT see [Project Document] & its details.4- (invited guest user): monitor assigned [Project] AND its Major steps with the comments Only.  can see [Project Document] & its details.##### The other staff & some properties:1- [Project]: creation date, ID number -digits only-, name, project actual start date, project estimated end date.2- [Project Document]: attached PDF file, ID number -digits only-, start date -different value from above-, end date -different value from above-, cleint name, price amount, uploader name, upload date & time.3- [Major Steps]: step name, completion date, small steps under it (names & number), comments.4- [small Steps: [Incoming Letter], [Outgoing Letter] or [Blueprint]]: step type, completion date, comments, attached PDF or PICTURE file, uploader name, upload date & time.##### Main support functions:1- Notifications2- Search3- logThat's all for now, please tell me the duration you need for such a system as well as your price & the required resources. I want the system to be accessible through a web browser and also downloadable from the app store (developed with ionic I prefer).I want the codes with the default UI only. no need to wrap it up completely.If you want any clarification, please let me know. And thank you for your time.
title: A simple web system - ionic app

desc: In this small job I need an image/video manipulation tool like in "Telegram messenger" for android:The starting point is a mobile gallery Image picker (modified CroPicker). On tap on an image a modified MaryPopup view will be opened which you can slide down to close the view. In this view i need the design and following functionality:- select / deselect image or video still (including selected media count)- crop image (you can use the Insta Cropper lib)- crop video- draw / write on the image with different fonts/pens/colours• undo functionality• delete/erase/ edit functionality• add stickers to images- image transformations(you can use the Glide Transformations lib and the android-close-pixelate lib)• brightness / contrast• different transformations filter• colour filter + grayscale• blur• toon• sepia• invert• pixel (android-close-pixelate lib)• sketch• vignette- smart image swipe (scale down the old image)- add text description- add “self destroy counter” (only the counter, without the destroy functionality)- save the modified file- notify the image-picker (CroPicker) about the changesOn the UI side I need smart animations while interacting with the UI.To get a better idea what a mean, take a look  into the "Telegram messenger"Design suggestion: [url removed, login to view]The Android Studio Project at which you have to work: [url removed, login to view]This project is extracted from the main app.Please take a look to the attachments and let me know your fix budget for this project and your estimated time effort.PLEASE BID ON THE PROJECT ONLY WHEN YOU ACCEPT FOLLOWING:1) No initial payment2) Milestone 1: Design + UI animationsMilestone 2: write / draw on imagesMilestone 3: Image/video cropping + image transformationsOn a good cooperation more jobs will followYou can use external libs, when the license allows commercial using.Used libs:CroPicker[url removed, login to view]Glide: [url removed, login to view]PhotoView:[url removed, login to view]MaryPopup:[url removed, login to view]Not implemented libs. Can (must not) be usedGlide Transformations:[url removed, login to view]Insta Cropper:[url removed, login to view]android-close-pixelate:[url removed, login to view]Please ask me, when you have any questions.Best regards,Aleksander
